programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris

Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E10, To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: The Clock Strikes Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E16, When 23-year-old Tonya McKinley is found brutally murdered on New Years Day 1985, a little boy is left motherless. A family must wait 35 years for advancements in forensic science to finally catch a killer using familial DNA.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).
Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo, 20070911070000 +0000, Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).

MST3K: Being From Another Planet, 19920704000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots watch a re-edited version of Time Walker (1982) called "Being From Another Planet" in which a mummy awakened by a university team goes on a killing spree.

MST3K: Bloodlust, 19940903000000 +0000, Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.
MST3K: Catalina Caper, 19901013000000 +0000, Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, scuba diving, and beach 'bunnies', while another boy's con-artist parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.

MST3K: Teenagers From Outer Space, 19920626000000 +0000, A group of aliens land on Earth and decide to use the planet as a farm for their livestock. One of the aliens rebels and flees to a small town, where he is pursued by another alien who kills anyone in his path.

MST3K: The Amazing Transparent Man, 19950318000000 +0000, During the feature film The Amazing Transparent Man (1960), a mad scientist makes an escaped criminal invisible so he can steal radioactive supplies.
MST3K: The Atomic Brain, 19931204000000 +0000, A rich, elderly woman wants her doctor to transplant her brain into the body of one of her young captives.

MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats, 19950121000000 +0000, After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast. Can desert patrolmen Jim Archer and Joe Dobson stop the creature before it kills again?

After All These Years, 20130420000000 +0000, When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.
I Do, I Do, I Do, 20150206000000 +0000, An architect (Autumn Reeser) relives her disastrous wedding day over and over until she faces her fears and discovers what she really wants in life.
Northpole, 20141115000000 +0000, When a loss of togetherness spreads across the globe and threatens the existence of Santa's Northpole, a little boy named Kevin is called upon to save the day.

Wedding Planner Mystery, 20141019000000 +0000, A young wedding planner is framed for a crime and struggles to clear her name as she learns that love does not always arrive in a pretty package. Stars Erica Durance, Andrew Walker and Brandon Beemer.

When Love Is Not Enough: The Lois Wilson Story, 20100425000000 +0000, Based on the true story of the enduring but troubled love between Lois Wilson, co-founder of Al-Anon, and her alcoholic husband Bill Wilson, co-founder of Alcoholics Anonymous. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Three Weeks, Three Kids, 20110101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Jennifer's life is turned around when she must take care of her sister's kids.
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

A Midnight Kiss, 20181229000000 +0000, With only one week to prepare, a party planner must enlist the help of a relative stranger to help her pull off the event. But what she didn't plan on was falling in love in the process. Stars Carlos PenaVega and Adelaide Kane.
A Family Christmas Gift, 20191222000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Amber spends the holidays with her Aunt Dora and helps plan a Christmas Concert.
It's Christmas, Carol!, 20120101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A modern-day spin on "A Christmas Carol".

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E19, Sheppard and the team visits the planet Taranis at the invitation of two leading citizens, Dr. Norina Pero and Chancellor Lycus, who want McKay to repair a failing shield generator at an Ancient base, and Ancient warship, they've discovered.

programme.title: Allies
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S02E20, Kenmore arrives back in Atlantis with a group of Wraith, in the midst of a civil war. Kenmore, hoping to leverage his knowledge of Atlantis against Sheppard and the team, suggests a trade; Beckett's serum, in exchange for keeping Atlantis hidden.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E06, Col. Young (Louis Ferreira) is plagued by a recurring vision wherein Destiny is attacked and destroyed by aliens. After placing the crew on high alert, he starts to feel that he may be losing his mind and questions his ability as the commander!

programme.title: The Greater Good
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E07, When Destiny comes upon a heavily damaged ship, Dr. Rush and Col. Young decide to make a dangerous space-suited expedition to the ship. But an unexpected turn of events leaves Dr. Rush and Col. Young stranded aboard the strange vessel.

programme.title: Malice
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E08, Lucian Alliance prisoner Simeon escapes, creating a manhunt on a remote planet. But Homeworld Command orders he be captured alive, believing Simeon has valuable information. Simeon must be brought back to the Destiny before he kills or is killed.

programme.title: Dominion
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E19, In an elaborate plan using Vala Mal Doran (Claudia Black) as bait to capture Adria (guest star Morena Baccarin), SG-1 themselves are surprised when Ba'al (guest star Cliff Simon) intercepts Adria from under them to use in his own evil plan.

programme.title: Unending
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S10E20, With extinction imminent, the Asgard hand over all their knowledge and technology to SG-1, but not before the Ori launch an attack trying to intercede. Starring Ben Browder, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks.

programme.title: Children Of The Gods (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E01, As Colonel Jack O'Neill and his team journey to Abydos to confront deadly warriors and laser-firing Death Gliders, O'Neill realizes that this new mission seems hauntingly familiar and that an old enemy has returned to take his revenge on Earth.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E03, In this suspenseful tale of survival of the fittest, O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and the SG-1 team must attempt to remove a Goa'uld larva that has infected Kawalsky's (guest star Jay Acovone) brain … but time is running out!

programme.title: Emancipation
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E04, On the planet Simarka, where the fierce race of Shavadai mistreat females, Capt. Samantha Carter (Amanda Tapping) challenges their ways in a thrilling battle of wits that may bring women equity or forever keep them as second-class citizens.

programme.title: The Broca Divide
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E05, Returning from a planet with both a civilized and primitive side, all but two of the team become infected and spread a brutal virus. Will Teal'c and Jackson find the cause, or are their colleagues doomed to become Stone Age primitives?

programme.title: The First Commandment
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E06, The SG-1 team is sent after the SG-9 team that has failed to return. They find that the team's captain (William Russ), having been treated like a god by planetary inhabitants, is drunk with power and is tyrannizing them. Can they overcome him?

programme.title: Cold Lazarus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E07, A strange crystal strikes down O'Neill, replacing him with a double that returns with the team to Earth to find the cause of O'Neill's private grief...his son's death. But the double is dangerously unstable. Can O'Neill return home to save everyone?

programme.title: The Nox
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E08, When a planned ambush goes disastrously wrong, resulting in fatalities among the SG-1 team, the peace-loving Nox restore them to life. But while these gentle people can bring back the dead, can they resist the deadly technology of the Goa'uld?

programme.title: Brief Candle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E09, On the mysterious planet Argos, the beautiful Kynthia seduces Colonel Jack O'Neill, which means he's condemned to an Argosian lifespan of only a hundred days. As he turns gray, will his team succeed in their frantic search for a cure?

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E010, A shooting at a rival high school raises concerns at West Beverly High.

programme.title: A Presumption of Innocence
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E011, Sue Scanlon accuses Gil Meyers of sexual misconduct, which leads to his suspension. Andrea offers her support to the misguided teen and finds that there's more to the story than Sue is telling.

programme.title: Destiny Rides Again
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E012, Dylan and Brenda's relationship become strained, while David encourages Donna to have sex with him.

programme.title: Rebel With A Cause
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E013, After his breakup with Brenda, Dylan begins seeing Kelly again. Cindy Walsh feels jealousy over Jim's attractive new secretary.

programme.title: Wild Horses
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E014, Steve's computer break-in results in his suspension from West Beverly, while Dylan meets a beautiful and wealthy woman.

programme.title: The Kindness of Strangers
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E015, The Walshes share Thanksgiving with the homeless man that Brandon had met during the summer.

programme.title: The Game Is Chicken
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E016, Steve and Brandon become involved in dangerous drag strip racing. Brenda and Kelly go on a blind double date to make Dylan jealous.

programme.title: It's a Totally Happening Life
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E017, The Gang celebrates the Christmas season by giving gifts to a group of underprivileged children.

programme.title: Midlife...Now What?
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E018, Secrets are revealed during a girls-only spa retreat, and Brandon begins gambling with a bookie.

programme.title: Back in the High Life Again
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E019, Dylan's father is released on parole and David feels the fallout from a parent's infidelity.

programme.title: Parental Guidance Recommended
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E020, Suspicions arise over Jack's handling of Dylan's trust fund. David is offered a deal by a music label but is pressured to fire Steve as his manager.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E021, Jack and Dylan begin a new life together, living aboard a yacht with Dylan's enormous trust fund at their disposal. On the surface, everything seems perfect, but Jack has some dangerous enemies.

programme.title: The Child is the Father to the Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E022, After Dylan accepts an invitation to stay at the Walsh home, he finds that old demons have returned to haunt him

programme.title: Duke's Bad Boy
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E023, Brandon's gambling spins out of control. Donna feels that David's new record label is running his music.

programme.title: Perfectly Perfect
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E024, Kelly's obsession with her weight turns dangerous. Brandon and Steve vie for the same girl's attention on a television game show.

programme.title: Senior Poll
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E025, The results of the Senior Poll are in, leading some to question whether it is exclusionary.

programme.title: She Came in Through the Bathroom Window
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E026, Senior Ditch-School day proves memorable as thieves prey upon the gang at an amusement park and then Peach Pit.

programme.title: Oakland Docu/Running Senior
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E192, Rescue 911 rides along with Mobile Crisis Team in Oakland California. A 70 year old suffers cardiac arrest after the 1600 meter race.

programme.title: Snomo’s Thru Ice/Russia
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E281, Two snowmobilers plunge through the ice into freezing water. A boy is severely burned when his clothes catch fire.

programme.title: Twin Drowning/Oklahoma Cops Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E232, A 6-year-old finds his twin baby brothers face down in the plastic cover of the family's swimming pool. Ride along with Oklahoma City Police Dept.

programme.title: African Croc/11 Yr Old Road
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E331, A boy on a safari is attacked by an alligator while swimming. An 11-year-old takes over driving when her mother loses consciousness.

programme.title: Chance Encounter/Baby Bathtub Burn
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E372, Rescuers search for a missing hiker in a treacherous canyon. A baby is burned when his sister tries to give him a bath.

programme.title: ATV 5 Yr Old/Honeybee Horror
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E371, A 5-year old boy tries to drive a four-wheel ATV and loses control. A man mowing disturbs a nest of 4,000 bees.

programme.title: Princess of Tides
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E08, A thrilling muscle boat competition is the backdrop for a whirlwind romance between Mitch and a beautiful woman he doesn't know is both a princess and the target of an assassination plot.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E09, Mitch and Stephanie board a yacht disguised as wealthy southern honeymooners to capture a group of modern-day pirates and find themselves oddly attracted to each other's undercover character.

programme.title: Lifeguards Can't Jump
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E10, Mitch and Garner go undercover as a two-on-two street basketball team to solve a young athlete's murder. CJ becomes involved with an amorous, honeymooning Midwestern tourist.

programme.title: Dead of Summer
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E11, A rock concert and political rally are the backdrop for a chilling assassination plot that finds CJ unconscious on an explosive-laden Scarab heading for the crowded pier.

programme.title: A Matter of Life and Death
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E12, A dispute between Mitch's lifeguard career and his father's desire to have him take over the family architecture business becomes intensified by devastating news about the elder Buchannon.

programme.title: Island of Romance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E13, CJ and Stephanie travel to Catalina Island for a "girls-only” weekend getaway, only to be distracted by two handsome men, leading to a life and death encounter. When Mitch and Hobie hire a gorgeous Swedish au pair, amorous complications ensue.

programme.title: Strangers Among Us
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E14, Mitch and Stephanie cope with an odd assembly of UFO enthusiasts camping on the beach in anticipation of an extraterrestrial visitation. Smugglers threaten Summer to recover diamonds they hid inside a surfboard Slade gave her.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E15, The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive, who forces Mitch and Stephanie overboard into the stormy Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E16, While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ, and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E17, An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E18, Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E19, When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E20, Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E21, Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly when an enemy from Mitch's past gets him into the ring. Meanwhile, CJ, seduced by a fashion photographer, considers leaving Baywatch for a modeling career.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E22, Mitch contends with an unorthodox, risk-taking Australian lifeguard, and rekindles his love affair with a beautiful journalist, Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E01, Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancé Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.
